conbody.p: DITA-SEMIA provides some functions for oXygen to facilitate your work.

In oXygen's Author Mode, the following buttons are displayed above the content that is generated with XSLT-Conref:
The button Refresh the XSLT-Conref refreshes the display of reused or imported data when the source content changed.
The button Open XSLT-Conref XSL Script file opens the XSL script file.
The button Open XSLT-Conref XML Source file opens the XML source file.
The button Click to open: opens a file that is defined by the user.
